properties.title: Länta-Hütte SAC
properties.description: The last (or rather first) section of Valser Rhein, called Länta, is considered one of the most beautiful glacier valleys in the Alps. The Länta hut is located in the centre of the Adula Alps, nestled against a mighty rock. It is visited by hikers, families, groups and mountain bikers. Alpine hiking trails, ascents of the surrounding summits, various climbing possibilities, col crossings and the four-day hike «Greina Alta» are the main attractions of the cabin.
